index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF LICENSES AND CONSUMER AFFAIRS
summary: AN ORDINANCE transferring from the Civil Service Department to the Department of Licenses and Consumer Affairs the responsibility for examining applicants for Licenses as refrigeration Mechanics and Engineers; fumigators and exterminators, meat cutters and wrapper salesman; steam engineers and boiler firemen; and amending Ordinances 84297, Section 5, 73223, Section 6, 94465, Section 4 48022, Sections 133, 134, 135, 137, 139, 140, 141, 143, 144, 94595, Section 4, and 94465, Section 11, accordingly.
